scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p src/generated && test -f src/generated/embedded-rg.ts || echo 'export const embeddedRg: string | null = null;' > src/generated/embedded-rg.ts
scripts.build: bun run prebuild && bun build --compile --minify ./index.ts --outfile dist/otto
scripts.build:darwin-arm64: bun run ../../scripts/build-web.ts && bun run ../../scripts/prepare-embedded-bins.ts darwin-arm64 && mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-arm64 ./index.ts --outfile dist/otto-darwin-arm64
scripts.build:darwin-x64: bun run ../../scripts/build-web.ts && bun run ../../scripts/prepare-embedded-bins.ts darwin-x64 && mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-x64 ./index.ts --outfile dist/otto-darwin-x64
